channel.title: Black Mesa Models bug out.
channel.description: The models in my game bug out I tried this fix [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14947[/url] But even after the textures on the models still bug and are missing and some models stretch. The game runs perfect for like 5 minutes and then it all starts happening. Can anyone help?

item.title: Black Mesa Models bug out.
item.dc:creator: Welek
item.description:
The models in my game bug out I tried this fix https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=14947
But even after the textures on the models still bug and are missing and some models stretch. The game runs perfect for like 5 minutes and then it all starts happening. Can anyone help?

Read full topic
